entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24 with temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Periods of snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24 with temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 30%
